properties.areaDesc: Waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 9:30PM CST until January 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 25 kts with gusts in excess of 30
kts at times. Seas of 5 to 8 feet are also expected.

* WHERE...Gulf waters out to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Now until 6 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly and southeasterly flow will
increase overnight and into tomorrow as low pressure deepens
across the High Plains. This will allow for hazardous marine
conditions to develop and persist through the day Wednesday.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY
